05 Oct 2008

I won't be able to release any code from my professional work. However, I will be talking about any open source or private work that I'm involved in here.

Source: Google code

Ruby on Rails webapp promoting sustainability in Glasgow.

Website: ontosearch.org

Though I have nothing to do with the latest incarnation of OntoSearch, I was involved in it's origin. At the end of my degree at University I completed a mini-project for the Semantic Web. It was a Java based search engine for Semantic Web documents.
